solution_line_template: Yes RSVP responses are {total_guests} x {yes_rsvp_percent_num}% = <<{total_guests}*{yes_rsvp_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={yes_responses}>>{yes_responses} guests.
No RSVP responses are {total_guests} x {no_rsvp_percent_num}% = <<{total_guests}*{no_rsvp_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={no_responses}>>{no_responses} guests.
Guests who did not respond at all are {total_guests} - {total_responded_guests} = <<{total_guests}-{total_responded_guests}={unresponded_guests}>>{unresponded_guests}.
